name: Docs MCP Server
short_desc: AI documentation assistant that provides up-to-date docs for coding assistants.
author: arabold
description: Docs MCP Server enhances AI coding assistants by providing accurate, version-specific documentation through indexing and searching various sources including websites, GitHub, npm, PyPI, and local files.

form_fields.label: OpenAI API Key
form_fields.hint: API key for embeddings (use 'ollama' for local Ollama)

form_fields.label: OpenAI API Base
form_fields.hint: API base URL (for Ollama use http://localhost:11434/v1)

form_fields.label: Embedding Model
form_fields.hint: Embedding model to use (nomic-embed-text for Ollama)
